title: Eternal
description: Victor Diaz has been walking the Earth for centuries, alone and empty. The loss of his lover to an angry mob is his last human memory. And now, on a dark city street Victor finds the one man who could be the reincarnation of his dead lover. Could this be a second chance? If it is, Victor will not let anything get in the way of rekindling their love. The vampires in Eternal are the old fashioned type vampires and not the more modern vampires depicted in most romances published today. This story contains blood.
author: Zachary Wild
